nodes.text: The "offshoot question" was the term given by genetically pure Arkanians to the matter over how to deal with the offshoot Arkanians. By the time of the Mandalorian Wars, most had opted for segregation and relegation to a subjected class. Arkoh Adasca planned to use Adascorp's genetic engineering expertise to solve the problem in a generation by releasing a plague that killed them.
Author John Jackson Miller based it on such historical ethnic/religious notions as the "Jewish Question."
